div.p: All data used in this publication are freely available on the Canada-Alberta Oil Sands Environmental Monitoring Information Portal: http://donnees.ec.gc.ca/data/air/monitor/ambient-air-quality-oil-sands-region/pollutant-transformation-summer-2013-aircraft-intensive-multi-parameters-oil-sands-region/?lang = en The source data underlying Figs. 1– 4, Supplementary Figs. 2b, c, 3d, 4b, and Tables 1 and 2 are provided as a Source Data file.
